entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 9:41 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
